entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
